attributes.action: make it law that baby p is not forgotton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please will the prime minister set something up for this poor poor child who didnt stand a chance in life perhaps a bench or something could be errected in baby p memory, i also think that the people who killed baby p should be identified and not have there names with held name the lot of them

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BABYPMEMORIAL/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
